full_text:
COURSE NAME: Certified in Cybersecurity (CC)

COURSE TOPICS: The course covers several key topics in cybersecurity. These include Security Principles, Business Continuity (BC), Disaster Recovery (DR), and Incident Response Concepts. Additionally, the course will delve into Access Controls Concepts, Network Security, and Security Operations.

COURSE SCHEDULE: The course begins on November 6, 2024. Classes will be held on Sundays and Wednesdays from 17:30 to 21:30. The course consists of 4 sessions, totaling 20 academic hours.

LEARNING FORMAT: The course is offered in a hybrid format. Participants can choose to attend classes either on the Bar-Ilan University campus in Ramat Gan or via Zoom.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, which is an official ISC2 academy in Israel. This program invites participants to gain foundational knowledge and expand their horizons in the field of cybersecurity.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: To schedule an admission interview and register, please contact Esther Asulin at 052-5886002 or via email at esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.
